topic: Support After Loss of Family Member and Medical Certificate Inquiry

correspondence.message: I have talked to my supervisor about my situation, and I have his approval. Who should I contact for more detailed questions? What type of medical certificate can I provide as supporting material for my loss? Would a certificate of death be sufficient, and how can I obtain a medical certificate during this time?"

You can find necessary information on the provided website. For a medical certificate, contact the student union for psychological counselling, as they can assist you. Check if you can officially return your thesis without negative consequences as well.
